name: EDMUND PUZZLE AND THE MYSTERY OF THE SACRED RELICS
name_original: EDMUND PUZZLE AND THE MYSTERY OF THE SACRED RELICS
description:
DMUND PUZZLE AND THE MYSTERY OF THE SACRED RELICS

Mystery. Adventure. Time travel. Get ready to embark on an epic adventure through time and space in Edmund Puzzle and the Mysteries of the Sacred Relics. In a world full of dangers and mysteries, every minute counts to save humanity from a mysterious and extremely dangerous enemy. You'll need to use all your skills to unravel various puzzles and brain teasers to rescue the most important sacred relics from the Christian Era. This is a case full of twists and surprises. So grab your backpack and your Oculus VR and embark on this exciting journey.

Step into the shoes of Edmund Puzzle, a fearless adventurer, in "Edmund Puzzle and the Mystery of the Sacred Relics." This virtual reality (VR) game offers an unparalleled experience of mystery, adventure, and time travel. Designed for Oculus VR, the game immerses you in a world brimming with suspense and challenges that will have you at the edge of your seat. The future of humanity is at stake, and only you have the skills to save it.

Key Features

Immersive VR Experience: Utilize the Oculus VR headset for an incredibly immersive experience. Feel every movement, solve puzzles in a 3D space, and interact with your environment like never before.

Intriguing Storyline: Traverse through different timelines and locations to collect sacred relics from the Christian Era. Uncover hidden clues, decode ancient scripts, and solve riddles that will take you closer to the truth.

Time-Travel Mechanism: Utilize a unique time-travel gameplay feature that lets you solve multi-layered puzzles and experience different historical settings.

High-Stakes Adventure: Time is of the essence as you race against a mysterious enemy threatening humanity. Make quick decisions, but be prepared for twists and surprises around every corner.

Interactive Gameplay: Highly interactive environments that allow you to manipulate objects, search for hidden items, and use tools to solve complex puzzles.

Rich Environments: Navigate through beautifully rendered landscapes, ancient ruins, and futuristic settings. Each location is crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

Challenging Puzzles: Test your intellect with an array of brain teasers and puzzles. Each puzzle is designed to challenge your logic, observational skills, and problem-solving abilities.
